member.name: T:PL.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: Une classe de ressource fortement typée destinée, entre autres, à la consultation des chaînes localisées.

member.name: P:PL.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Retourne l'instance ResourceManager mise en cache utilisée par cette classe.

member.name: P:PL.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Remplace la propriété CurrentUICulture du thread actuel pour toutes les recherches de ressources à l'aide de cette classe de ressource fortement typée.

member.name: F:PL.MainCL.WM_Message.WM_ENABLE
member.summary: wParam : Indicates whether the window has been enabled Or disabled. This parameter Is True If the window has been enabled Or False If the window has been disabled.

member.name: F:PL.MainCL.WM_Message.WM_SETTEXT
member.summary:
This can't be sent with PostMessage wParam This parameter Is Not used. lParam A pointer To a null-terminated String that Is the window text. Must be used like : Dim Txt As IntPtr = Marshal.StringToHGlobalAnsi("YourText)
NativeFunctions.Win32.User32.SendMessage(Me.Handle, NativeFunctions.Win32.User32.WM_Message.WM_SETTEXT, 0, Txt)

member.name: F:PL.MainCL.WM_Message.WM_KEYDOWN
member.summary:
wParam :
The virtual-key code Of the key being pressed. See Virtual-Key Codes.
lParam : The repeat count, scan code, extended-key flag, context code, previous key-state flag, And transition-state flag, As shown In the following table. Refer to : https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/win32/inputdev/wm-keydown

member.name: F:PL.MainCL.WM_Message.WM_SYSKEYDOWN
member.summary:
wParam :
The virtual-key code Of the key being pressed. See Virtual-Key Codes.
lParam : The repeat count, scan code, extended-key flag, context code, previous key-state flag, And transition-state flag, As shown In the following table. Refer to : https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/win32/inputdev/wm-syskeydown

member.name: F:PL.MainCL.WM_Message.WM_KEYUP
